description: There is an infinite 2D plane. You are given a positive integer k. You are also given a 2D array queries, which contains the following queries: After each query, you need to find the distance of the kth nearest obstacle from the origin. Return an integer array results where results[i] denotes the kth nearest obstacle after query i, or results[i] == -1 if there are less than k obstacles. Note that initially there are no obstacles anywhere. The distance of an obstacle at coordinate (x, y) from the origin is given by |x| + |y|.
